data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Eure-et-Loir, Centre-Val de Loire, France to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Eure-et-Loir, Centre-Val de Loire, France
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 5,370 believers in the county of Eure-et-Loir into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 81 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 5,370 believers in Eure-et-Loir to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Eure-et-Loir against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Lucé
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Lucé, Centre-Val de Loire, France.
Father, guide the church in Eure-et-Loir, Centre-Val de Loire, France to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Eure-et-Loir, Centre-Val de Loire, France.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Eure-et-Loir.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
